You find the most strategic options for you and your allies. When you use this action, attempt a @Check[society|dc:@self.level|roller:self] or @Check[warfare-lore|dc:@self.level|roller:self] check. The DC is usually a standard-difficulty DC of your level, but the GM can assign a different DC based on the circumstances.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.Stance: Strategist Stance]

Critical Success Your marshal's aura increases to a @Template[type:emanation|distance:20], and it grants you and allies a +1 status bonus to Reflex saving throws. Once per turn, when you succeed or critically succeed at a Recall Knowledge check to gain information about an enemy creature, the target of the Recall Knowledge check becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Off-Guard] to the next attack made against it by you or an ally in your aura.

Success As critical success, but your aura's size doesn't increase.

Failure You fail to enter the stance.

Critical Failure You fail to enter the stance and can't take this action again for 1 minute.
